page.title: 09MONSAL HEAD
page.content: {Monsal Head Cycle Hire is based in the {old stable block of the Monsal Head {Hotel and in addition to Cycle Hire {offers a sales servive as well as {repairs and spares. {Monsal Head Craft Centre} is in the upper storey of the Cycle Hire building and sells locally made crafts in wood and pottery as well as art work and local interest books. The Monsal Head Hotel was formally the Bulls Head an old coaching inn. The Hotel offers bed and breakfast in addition to other meals and bar facilities. The Hotel is unusual in that one bar is in the Parish of Great Longstone and the other is in Ashford. The Monsal Head Cafe was said to have served the railway staff before the line closed in the 1960's. It has also been a keepers cottage .
